title: Spatial Data Science for Social Geography
text:
This will be a course on Spatial Data Science for Social Geography.
The course will be taught in-person at the Charles University in Prague from October 2023.
More information will be shared closer to the starting date.

title: Jupyter and Python
text:
For a demonstration of a line plot on a polar axis, see Figure 1.

import numpy as np
1import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

2r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
3theta = 2 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(subplot_kw={"projection": "polar"})
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()


1

Take penguins, and then,

2

add new columns for the bill ratio and bill area.

3

bla bla make a plot







Figure 1: Image caption here.
